author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MARIO BEGINNING TO MOVE OVER COOLER WATERS...
summary: ...MARIO BEGINNING TO MOVE OVER COOLER WATERS... As of 8:00 PM PDT Mon Sep 15 the center of Mario was located near 21.5, -115.0 with movement NW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 995 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MARIO BEGINNING TO MOVE OVER COOLER WATERS... As of 8:00 PM PDT Mon Sep 15 the center of Mario was located near 21.5, -115.0 with movement NW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 995 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Mario (EP3/EP132025)
